blocks.name: cquot
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the quotient of a polynomial division.
blocks.origin: const class cquot { quot }

blocks.name: diff.cquot.s
diff.cquot.c
diff.cquot.w
df-quot
blocks.content: Define the quotient function on polynomials. This is the ` q ` of the expression ` f = g x. q + r ` in the division algorithm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-quot(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cquot, cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cply, cc), cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), crio(s2, cfv(cply, cc), wsbc(s3, co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), co(cv(s1), cof(cmul), cv(s2))), wo(wceq(cv(s3), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(s3)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-quot(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ quot =(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), s1 ∈((Poly ` ℂ)\ { 0p })↦ iota(s2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),[(s0[oF(-)](s1[oF(×)]s2))/ s3](s3 = 0p ∨(deg ` s3)[<](deg ` s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

thm quotval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c2, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  plyssc(c1)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))))
  sylan2br(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c2, c0p)), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c2, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p))))
  eldifsn(c2, cfv(cply, cc), c0p)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cply, cc), c2, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), cquot, crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))))
  riotabidv(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  bitrd(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wsbc(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))))
  sbceq1d(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  syl6eqr(co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), c3, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sylan2(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0)), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0)), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)), cof(cmin))
  syl5bb(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcie(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  ovexi(c3, c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs2), c3, c0p)
  breq1d(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c3, cdgr)
  orbi2d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))
  breq2d(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  fveq2d(cdgr, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-quot(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  riotaex(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cply, cc))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)))
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cply, cc))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)))
  diff.hs1.c(crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.w(wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm quotval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ≠ 0p)→(c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  ⊣ c3 =(c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(×)]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3an1(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ≠ 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  sseli(c0, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ℂ))
  syl3an2(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ≠ 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  sseli(c2, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ℂ))
  plyssc(c1)
  3impb(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c2 ≠ 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  sylan2br(c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), (c2 ∈(Poly ` ℂ)∧ c2 ≠ 0p), (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c2 ∈((Poly ` ℂ)\ { 0p }))
  eldifsn(c2, (Poly ` ℂ), c0p)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, (Poly ` ℂ), c2, ((Poly ` ℂ)\ { 0p }), cquot, iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),[(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1))))
  riotabidv(s0, (Poly ` ℂ), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), [(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)))
  bitrd((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), [(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)), [c3 / hs2](hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  sbceq1d(hs2, (hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0)), c3, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), (hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  syl6eqr((hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0)), c3, (c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(×)]s0)), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  sylan2(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(×)]s0))=(c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(×)]s0)), (hs1[oF(×)]s0)=(c2[oF(×)]s0))
  oveq1(hs1, c2, oF(×), s0)
  oveq12(hs0, c0, (hs1[oF(×)]s0), (c2[oF(×)]s0), oF(-))
  syl5bb((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), [c3 / hs2](hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  sbcie(hs2, c3, (hs2 = 0p ∨(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  ovexi(c3, c0, oF(-), (c2[oF(×)]s0))
  orbi12d(hs2 = c3, hs2 = 0p, (deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1), c3 = 0p, (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1))
  eqeq1(hs2, c3, c0p)
  breq1d((deg ` hs2), clt, (deg ` hs1), (deg ` c3), hs2 = c3)
  fveq2(hs2, c3, cdgr)
  orbi2d((hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2), c3 = 0p, (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1), (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))
  breq2d((deg ` c3), clt, (deg ` hs1), (deg ` c2), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  fveq2d(cdgr, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c2))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-quot(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  riotaex(s0, (Poly ` ℂ), (c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Poly ` ℂ))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(((Poly ` ℂ)\ { 0p }))
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Poly ` ℂ))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((Poly ` ℂ)\ { 0p }))
  diff.hs1.c(iota(s0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ),(c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.w((c3 = 0p ∨(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: plydivlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plydivalg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plydivlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(nat0, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(nat0, c0)), wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c0)))
  syl5eqelr(nat0, c0, co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), w0)
  1pneg1e0()
  caovcld(s0, s1, nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  syl5eqelr(nat1, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), w0)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  caovcld(s0, s1, cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm plydivlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))→(s0[+]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))→(s0[×]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ≠ 0))→(1[÷]s0)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → -u(1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → 0 ∈ c0), ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ≠ 0))→(1[÷]s0)∈ c0))
  syl5eqelr(nat0, c0, (1[+]-u(1)), w0)
  1pneg1e0()
  caovcld(s0, s1, nat1, caddc, -u(1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  syl5eqelr(nat1, c0, (-u(1)[×]-u(1)), w0)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  caovcld(s0, s1, -u(1), cmul, -u(1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plydivalg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)

thm plydivlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, c0p))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), wi(w0, wne(c3, c0p)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), diffsc(s0, c2))

thm plydivlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→(s1[+]s2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→(s1[×]s2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ≠ 0))→(1[÷]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → -u(1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ≠ 0p)
  ⊣ c1 =(c2[oF(-)](c3[oF(×)]s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ≠ 0))→(1[÷]s1)∈ c0))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), (w0 → c3 ≠ 0p))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))→ c1 ∈(Poly ` c0)), d(s2, c1))
  syl5eqel(c1, (Poly ` c0), (c2[oF(-)](c3[oF(×)]s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0)))
  plysub(s1, s2, c2, (c3[oF(×)]s0), c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), c2 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  plymul(s1, s2, c3, s0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(Poly ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), c3 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0), (s1[+]s2)∈ c0)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), (s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0), (s1[×]s2)∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), -u(1)∈ c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, oF(×), s0)
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, c3, oF(×), s0)
  diff.cof.s(s2, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, (Poly ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, c0)
  diff.cply.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s0 ∈(Poly ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, (Poly ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cply, c0)
  diff.cply.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

thm plydivlem3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈(Poly ` c0),(c1 = 0p ∨(deg ` c1)[<](deg ` c2))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→(s1[+]s2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→(s1[×]s2)∈ c0)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)

blocks.origin:
thm plydivex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c0p))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s2, c3))
  mpd(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))), wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))))
  syl(w0, wrex(hs0, cn, wbr(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))), wcel(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), cr))
  resubcld(cfv(cdgr, c3), cfv(cdgr, c2), w0)
  nn0red(cfv(cdgr, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cdgr, c3), cn0), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  dgrcl(c3, c0)
  nn0red(cfv(cdgr, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cdgr, c2), cn0), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  arch(hs0, co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cn, w0, wbr(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  syl5(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wbr(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), clt, cv(hs0)), wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(co(cfv(cdgr, c3), cmin, cfv(cdgr, c2)), clt, cv(hs0))))

thm plydiveu(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s3), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s3), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s3)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wne(cv(s2), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c0p))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wo(wceq(c4, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c4), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  mpbid(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), cxp(cc, csn(nat0))))
  syl6eq(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), cxp(cc, csn(nat0)), c0p, w0)
  pm2.61dne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p))
  idd(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p))
  sylibd(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p), wceq(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p), wceq(co(c3, cof(cmin), c4), c0p))
  ex(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p), wceq(co(c3, cof(cmin), c4), c0p))
  syldan(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p), wceq(co(c3, cof(cmin), c4), c0p), wceq(cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4))), nat0))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4))), nat0, cfv(cfv(ccoe, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, c2)), wa(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p)))
  fveq2d(cfv(ccoe, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, c2), wa(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p)))
  mpbir2and(wa(w0, wne(co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), cv(s1)), c0p)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, c2)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c2), cle, cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4))))

  letrd(cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cfv(cdgr, c2), cif(cfv(cdgr, c4), cfv(cdgr, c3), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), cle, cfv(cdgr, c4))), w0)
  ifcld(cfv(cdgr, c4), cfv(cdgr, c3), cr, w0, wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), cle, cfv(cdgr, c4)))
  nn0red(cfv(cdgr, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cdgr, c4), cn0), wcel(c4, cfv(cply, c0)))
  dgrcl(c4, c0)
  nn0red(cfv(cdgr, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cdgr, c3), cn0), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  dgrcl(c3, c0)
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c3, cof(cmin), c4)), cle, cif(cfv(cdgr, c4), cfv(cdgr, c3), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), cle, cfv(cdgr, c4)))), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)), wcel(c4, cfv(cply, c0)))
  dgrsub(c3, c0, c4, cfv(cdgr, c3), cfv(cdgr, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wbr(cif(cfv(cdgr, c4), cfv(cdgr, c3), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), cle, cfv(cdgr, c4))), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c4), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), cle, cfv(cdgr, c2)))

blocks.name: plydivalg
blocks.content: The division algorithm on polynomials over a subfield ` S ` of the complex numbers. If ` F ` and ` G =/= 0 ` are polynomials over ` S ` , then there is a unique quotient polynomial ` q ` such that the remainder ` F - G x. q ` is either zero or has degree less than ` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→(s1[×]s2)∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ≠ 0))→(1[÷]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → -u(1)∈ c0)

  sylanbrc(w0, ∃!(s0 ∈(Poly ` c0),(c1 = 0p ∨(deg ` c1)[<](deg ` c2))), ∃(s0 ∈(Poly ` c0),(c1 = 0p ∨(deg ` c1)[<](deg ` c2))), ∀(s0 ∈(Poly ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(Poly ` c0),(((c1 = 0p ∨(deg ` c1)[<](deg ` c2))∧((c3[oF(-)](c2[oF(×)]hs0))= 0p ∨(deg `(c3[oF(-)](c2[oF(×)]hs0)))[<](deg ` c2)))→ s0 = hs0))))

blocks.name: quotlem
blocks.content: Lemma for properties of the polynomial quotient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

thm quotcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cquot, c1), cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c0p))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  simpld(w0, wcel(co(c0, cquot, c1), cfv(cply, c2)), wo(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1)))), clt, cfv(cdgr, c1))))
  quotlem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))), w0)
  eqid(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1)))
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)

  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cquot, c1)

}

  plyssc(c1)

thm quotdgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  quotlem(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cc, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))

  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc))
  reccl(cv(hs0))

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))

  offval2(hs0, cidp, cmin, cxp(cc, csn(c0)), cc, cv(hs0), c0, universe, cc, cc, wcel(c0, cc))

  subeq0(cv(hs0), c0)

  plyconst(cc, c0)

  eleq1a(c0, cc, cv(hs0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)

blocks.name: plyrem
blocks.content: The polynomial remainder theorem, or little Bézout's theorem (by contrast to the regular Bézout's theorem ~ bezout ). If a polynomial ` F ` is divided by the linear factor ` x - A ` , the remainder is equal to ` F ( A ) ` , the evaluation of the polynomial at ` A ` (interpreted as a constant polynomial). This is part of Metamath 100 proof #89. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: facth
blocks.content: The factor theorem. If a polynomial ` F ` has a root at ` A ` , then ` G = x - A ` is a factor of ` F ` (and the other factor is ` F quot G ` ). This is part of Metamath 100 proof #89. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm facth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c2))))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0)), cxp(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2)))))
  plyrem(c0, c1, c2, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), c3)
  eqid(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))))
  xpeq2d(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2)), csn(nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  sneqd(cfv(c0, c2), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0))), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)))), wcel(cc, universe), wf(c0, cc, cc), wf(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cc, cc))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wf(c0, cc, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
  plyf(c0, c1)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wf(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cc, cc), wcel(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cfv(cply, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c3), cfv(cply, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c3), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c3, c0p))
  sseldi(c0, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  plyssc(c1)
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0))
  simp1d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(nat0)), csn(c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wne(c3, c0p), wne(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0))
  eqnetrd(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0, nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  simp2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat1), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(nat0)), csn(c2)))

  ax-1ne0()

  syl6eq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0, cfv(cdgr, c0p), wceq(c3, c0p))
  fveq2(c3, c0p, cdgr)
  dgr0()

  plymulcl(c3, cc, co(c0, cquot, c3))

  eqtrd((c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(×)](c0[quot]c3))), (ℂ × { 0 }), (ℂ × {(c0 ` c2)}), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0))

  simp3(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈ ℂ, (c0 ` c2)= 0)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), ((c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(×)](c0[quot]c3)))=(ℂ × { 0 })↔ c0 =(c3[oF(×)](c0[quot]c3))), ℂ ∈ 𝕌, (c0 : ℂ → ℂ), ((c3[oF(×)](c0[quot]c3)): ℂ → ℂ))

  syl2anc((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), (c3[oF(×)](c0[quot]c3))∈(Poly ` ℂ), c3 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), (c0[quot]c3)∈(Poly ` ℂ))
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), (c0[quot]c3)∈(Poly ` ℂ), c0 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c3 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), c3 ≠ 0p)
  sseldi(c0, (Poly ` ℂ), (Poly ` c1), (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  plyssc(c1)
  simp1(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈ ℂ, (c0 ` c2)= 0)
  simp1d((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), c3 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), (deg ` c3)= 1, (`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 })
  syl((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), c3 ≠ 0p, (deg ` c3)≠ 0)
  eqnetrd((deg ` c3), nat0, nat1, (c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  simp2d((c0 ∈(Poly ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ ℂ ∧(c0 ` c2)= 0), (deg ` c3)= 1, c3 ∈(Poly ` ℂ), (`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 })
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈(Poly ` c1), c2 ∈ ℂ, (c0 ` c2)= 0, (c3 ∈(Poly ` ℂ)∧(deg ` c3)= 1 ∧(`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 }))

blocks.name: vieta1lem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ vieta1 : inductive step. Let ` z ` be a root of ` F ` . Then ` F = ( Xp - z ) x. Q ` for some ` Q ` by the factor theorem, and ` Q ` is a degree- ` D ` polynomial, so by the induction hypothesis ` sum_ x e. ( ``' Q " 0 ) x = -u ( coeff `` Q ) `` ( D - 1 ) / ` ` ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` , so ` sum_ x e. R x = z - ( coeff `` Q ) `` ` ` ( D - 1 ) / ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` . Now the coefficients of ` F ` are ` A `` ( D + 1 ) = ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` and ` A `` D = ` ` sum_ k e. ( 0 ... D ) ( coeff `` Xp - z ) `` k x. ( coeff `` Q ) ` ` `` ( D - k ) ` , which works out to ` -u z x. ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` ` + ( coeff `` Q ) `` ( D - 1 ) ` , so putting it all together we have ` sum_ x e. R x = -u A `` D / A `` ( D + 1 ) ` as we wanted to show. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: vieta1
blocks.content: The first-order Vieta's formula (see ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vieta%27s_formulas ). If a polynomial of degree ` N ` has ` N ` distinct roots, then the sum over these roots can be calculated as ` -u A ( N - 1 ) / A ( N ) ` . (If the roots are not distinct, then this formula is still true but must double-count some of the roots according to their multiplicities.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm vieta1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(c1, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(c1, c2)))))

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(c1, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(c1, c2))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  mpd(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(c1, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2))
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, cfv(cply, cc), w0, wi(wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wceq(csu(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(c1, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(c1, c2))))), wi(wa(wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0))), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)))), wceq(csu(s0, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0))), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)))), wceq(csu(s0, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)), cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(cfv(ccoe, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wceq(csu(s0, c0, cv(s0)), cneg(co(cfv(c1, co(c2, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, cfv(c1, c2)))))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wa(wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0))), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2), wa(wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0))), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0))), wceq(c2, cfv(cdgr, c3)), wceq(cfv(chash, c0), c2))
  eqeq2d(c2, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)), cfv(cdgr, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq12d(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), csn(nat0))), cfv(cdgr, cv(hs0)), cfv(chash, c0), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c3))

blocks.name: plyexmo
blocks.content: An infinite set of values can be extended to a polynomial in at most one way. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plyexmo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cc), wn(wcel(c0, cfn))), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c1)), wceq(cres(cv(s0), c0), c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
